title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Youre inspired to shower adoring attention on your loved ones today, especially romantic partners or interests. Youre willing to flex your tenderness in platonic relationships or to innocently flirt with acquaintances. In any case, youre liable to be noticed by numerous admirers while Venus sparkles in your 7th House of Others. However, this planetary blessing does not arrive without challenges. You might not be as prepared to receive affection as you are to offer it. Appreciate your worthiness. If youre able to give excellent care and love, youre valuable enough to receive it. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
